attributes.action: increase awards and grants to disabled entrepreneurs and those who want to set-up their own business and be able to offer employment to others irrespective of abilities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more disabled people in a similar position to me are being rejected by employer's as we are considered a liability. I would dearly love to work and earn a liveable wage instead of having to rely on benefits.

Not enough EU funding for Economic Development is being set aside regionally for those who what to start-up and run a business
